data.title: L. Sprague De Camp
data.meta_description: Book: L. Sprague De Camp - The Glory That Was - Paperback Library - Paperback - USA (1971)
data.text:
ppint. ●

3rd Feb 2024

first published date is^W was wrong and should^W has been corrected to 1960

the short novel version ''serialized'' in startling stories vol.25 #3, 4/1952, may've been abridged - or an earlier, somewhat shorter - version; i've not attempted to compare the word-counts.

the first edition is the avalon books h/cvr published by thomas bouregy & co. in h/cvr in 1960ppint. ●

23rd Aug 2019

coronet communications paperback library mmpb simultaneous first printings sharing merkin-printed covers and hence cat#, first p/b edition

cover art by richard powers (signed "powers LAZ/org", uncredited)

cover price 60¢

160pp. including titles, indicia etc, end pp. advertising

refer to indicia to see if carcass (or "book") of copy held was canadadian- or merkin- printed

no priority established nor liable to be, both state first printing: march, 1971
